title: Update Inventory After Receiving Shipment
description: A warehouse manager needs to update inventory levels after receiving a new shipment of products from a supplier.

tasks.description: Scan the SKUs and quantities from the supplier's packing slip.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent ingests the list of SKUs and quantities received.

tasks.description: For each SKU, increase the inventory count in the system by the quantity received.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the stock levels for all received items.
